intro_where_every: Where every transaction counts: Invest, save and pay with Ejara
intro_easily_save_for_emergencies: Easily save for emergencies while earning a 2% annual interest rate. Backed by government bonds, it guarantees security, flexibility, and easy access to your funds. Download the app to start saving.
intro_turn_your_dreams: Turn your dreams into reality with Objective Savings. Whether you plan the next school year or a travel project, we are here to accompany you. Download the application now to create a goal.
intro_invested_as_professionals: Invested as professionals in government bonds from 1000 CFA and earns up to 6.5% annual interest. The capital is guaranteed by the Bank of Central African States (BEAC)
